UpdateSourceArgs: /c for /d %i in ("G:\AMPDatastore\Instances\Rclone01\rclone\serverfiles\rclone-v*-windows-amd64") do (if exist "%i\%~nxi" robocopy "%i\%~nxi" "G:\AMPDatastore\Instances\Rclone01\rclone\serverfiles" /MOVE /E /R:0 /W:0) & if exist "%i\%~nxi" rd /S /Q "%i\%~nxi" & robocopy "%i" "G:\AMPDatastore\Instances\Rclone01\rclone\serverfiles" /MOVE /E /R:0 /W:0 & cd /d "G:\AMPDatastore\Instances\Rclone01\rclone\serverfiles" & if exist "%i" rd /S /Q "%i"
